title: SetSessionConfigAspectRespondNeedTime (Method)
text:
METHOD SetSessionConfigAspectRespondNeedTime :
Error
Set optional outstation session configuration aspect - respond need-time.

rows.Name: respondNeedTime
rows.Comment:
Specifies whether this device will set the Need Time IIN bit
in response to this session at startup and after the clock valid
period has elapsed. If this bit is set the master will respond
with a time synchronization request. Typically this parameter
should be true for one session for each Outstation device. Set this
parameter to FALSE if report by exception is not supported
or there is no reason this device needs to be synchronized from
the master.
